name: Tetris Mario
description:
2 classic game from 2 classic eras combined: Try to reach the top by stacking the Tetris blocks.

Controls:

"A" and "D" to move the blocks, "Space" to rotate them

"Arrow Keys" to move Mario.

-- Made for the Mix and Game Jam

-- Theme: DIMENSION CHANGE
(Take a game mechanic from one dimension and recreate it in another)

All game assets and code were made during the jam (2 days).
